name: ISO 12369. Graphic Technology -- Prepress digital data exchange -- Tag image file format for image technology (TIFF/IT) (formal name); TIFF/IT (common name)

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

description: ISO 12639:2004 specifies a media-independent means for prepress electronic data exchange using a tag image file format (TIFF).
